review_data.title: Unfortunately the reservation
review_data.content: Unfortunately the reservation didn't work out and four of us stood on the street on Saturday evening. No big apology or help from the employees. Very sad.

review_data.title: Average Pad Thai
review_data.content: I came here on a friend’s recommendation for lunch with friends. We had a red curry, fried vegetables with rice and a Pad Thai. The Pad Thai was very average, as if the soy sauce was triple the amount in needed, quite over spiced (not...More

review_data.title: Hidden extra charges
review_data.content: The menu says the Pad Thai comes with meat of your choice, but didn't bother saying that some meats cost extra. So you wouldn't know that until you get your check... A minor issue... they try to squeeze different groups to the same table, even...More

review_data.title: Okay asian food
review_data.content: Been to this place with my wife and my mom. The food was good without being exceptional (a tad blend for me for Asian food). However the place is super noisy and by the end of the diner I walked out with a strained voice...More

review_data.title: Nicht umsonst beliebt
review_data.content: Meist ist das Ah Hua ziemlich voll. Daher lohnt sich eine vorgängige Reservation. Ist man etwas früher dran, findet sich...More

review_data.title: Bussy thai place
review_data.content: Good authentic food. Verry bussy. Sometimes too bussy so they forget an order or you have to wait long. The menu is a bit unstructured. There is no apero choice, if you want a drink before dinner better enjoy it somewhere else.

review_data.title: Best Thai in Zürich
review_data.content: Great value, authentic Thai. Always busy for a reason. is highly recommended. do try the Thai Coffee :)

review_data.title: Ente gut alles gut
review_data.content: meine Lieblingsente gibt es hier. herrlich unspektakulärer laden mit fantastischem essen. immer wieder ein Besuch wert

review_data.title: Takeaway with Value
review_data.content: Regularly I visit for Lunch. You get all you can Eat for less than 20.- with a choice of 3 Menues, Rice, Springrolls and so on... Its good Thai food over the street, perfect for Lunch. Not to be mistaken with the Ah Hua Restaurant...More
